postgresql_postgresql_default_privileges.description: Creates and manages default privileges given to a user for a database schema.

role.description: The name of the role to which grant default privileges on.

database.description: The database to grant default privileges for this role.

owner.description: Role for which apply default privileges (You can change default privileges only for objects that will be created by yourself or by roles that you are a member of).

schema.description: The database schema to set default privileges for this role.

object_type.description: The PostgreSQL object type to set the default privileges on (one of: table, sequence).

privileges.description: The list of privileges to apply as default privileges.
